TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HttpSessionStateBase extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public MustInherit Class HttpSessionStateBase Implements ICollection
public ref class HttpSessionStateBase abstract : System::Collections::ICollection

summary.span: 作為可存取工作階段狀態值、工作階段層級設定和生命週期管理方法之類別的基底類別。

span.span: Serves as the base class for classes that provides access to session-state values, session-level settings, and lifetime management methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是抽象類別，其中包含相同的成員類別。The class is an abstract class that contains the same members as the class. 類別可讓您建立衍生的類別，它就像是類別，但您可以自訂，且該工作外的 ASP.NET 管線。The class enables you to create derived classes that are like the class, but that you can customize and that work outside the ASP.NET pipeline. 當您執行單元測試時，您通常會使用衍生的類別來實作自訂行為符合您要測試的案例中的成員。When you perform unit testing, you typically use a derived class to implement members with customized behavior that fulfills the scenario you are testing. 類別衍生自 類別。The class derives from the class. 類別可做為包裝函式類別。The class serves as a wrapper for the class. 在執行階段，您通常使用的執行個體類別來呼叫的成員物件。At run time, you typically use an instance of the class to call members of the object.

Protected Sub New ()
protected: HttpSessionStateBase();

summary.span: 初始化這個類別，以供繼承的類別執行個體使用。

span.span: Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance.

summary.span: 這個建構函式只能由繼承的類別呼叫。

span.span: This constructor can only be called by an inherited class.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中被覆寫時，取消目前的工作階段。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, cancels the current session.
Always.

Always.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, copies the collection of session-state values to a one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index in the array.
Always.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時取得物件集合，該集合是由標記為伺服器控制項，而且範圍限定為應用程式的 Global.asax 檔中目前工作階段的 項目宣告。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets a collection of objects that are declared by elements that are marked as server controls and scoped to the current session in the application's Global.asax file.

value.span: 在Global.asax 檔中宣告的物件。

span.span: The objects that are declared in the Global.asax file.
Always.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得或設定在工作階段狀態提供者結束工作階段之前，在要求之間所經過的時間，以分鐘為單位。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the time, in minutes, that can elapse between requests before the session-state provider ends the session.

value.span: 逾時期限 (以分鐘為單位)。

span.span: The time-out period, in minutes.
Always.
